snippet: According to a survey of manufacturers and service companies, United States companies are reporting stronger order flows than those in most other countries, while Germany is no longer reporting strong numbers, and orders are weakening sharply in some...
lead_paragraph: According to a survey of manufacturers and service companies, United States companies are reporting stronger order flows than those in most other countries, while Germany is no longer reporting strong numbers, and orders are weakening sharply in some other members of the euro zone.

headline.seo: Relative Strength in U.S. Business Orders
headline.main: Off the Charts: Relative Strength in U.S. Business Orders
